name: tm71
effect: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.
